cause.description:
people like glowing things
some people don't have glowing things
some people don't have access to glowing things
some people do have access to glowing things
those people with access should give glowing things to
people without access to glowing things
share the love
share the glow
1. People like glowing things
2. People want glowing things
3. people need glowing things
4. people should have glowing things
5. give people glowing things
cause.mission: to provide glowsticks to those without any
cause.name: Glowsticks for all
